name: Emerald City DAO
introduce: Emerald City DAO is the first decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) founded on Flow. It has developed community-building services and tools used across the Flow ecosystem. Emerald City separates into three guilds: Education, Building, and Governance. The DAO’s Governance guild is currently experimenting with a voting structure that is based on democratically earned on-chain reputation instead of traditional token-based voting.
